tgt_text: abantu abanezigulo – ezifana nombefu, uxinzelelo lwegazi, isifo sezintso esinganyangekiyo kunye nesifo seswekile bangaba neempawu ezimbi kakhulu zentsholongwane icorona (icovid19), kwaye basenokufa ngenxa yobunzima obubekwa yiintsholongwane emizimbeni yabongethamsanqa, xa ugqirha oyingcali yokunyanga osebenze ekapa okwangumama womntwana oneminyaka emithathu, uinsaaf mohammed (oneminyaka yobudala engama40) wosuleleka yicovid19 ngelixa ehlaselwe sisifo sombefu, wakwazi ukumelana nazo zombini ezi meko kwaye akazange agule kakhulu.

src_text: mashudu mavhuya, musi occupational therapist na mme wa vhana vhararu vho insaaf mohammed (40) vho wanwa vha na covid19 musi vha na vhulwadze ha asima, vho kona u langa malwadze aya oṱhe nahone vha sa tou lwalesa.
tgt_text: umohammed wosulelwa ngumyeni wakhe ngecovid19, osebenza kwilebhu ekwisibhedlele sasegroote schuur.

src_text: vho mohammed vho wana covid19 kha munna wavho, vha shumaho laborithari ya sibadela tsha groote schuur.
tgt_text: unyana kamohammed oneminyaka esixhenxe naye wosulelwe.

src_text: murwa wa vho mohammed wa miṅwaha ya sumbe na ene o ḓo kavhiwa nga dwadze.
tgt_text: emva kokuba kufunyaniswe ukuba bosulelekile, bonke bazigcina bucala ekhaya.

src_text: nga murahu ha u wana uri vho kavhiwa, vhuraru havho vho ḓo ḓivalela hayani havho vha sa kwamane na vhaṅwe vhathu.
tgt_text: "sazivalela kwigumbi lethu lokulala, ngelixa umazala wam onesifo seswekile kunye noxinzelelo lwegazi kwaye ngethamsanqa zange osuleleke yintsholongwane – yena wayekhathalela abanye babantwana bethu ababini," utsho umohammed.

src_text: "ro ḓivalela kha lufhera lwa u eḓela, musi mazwale wanga – vhane vha vha na vhulwadze ha swigiri na mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha, nga mashudu vha sa kavhiwe nga tshitzhili – vha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu vhaṅwe vhavhili," vho mohammed vha ralo.
tgt_text: ngokwesebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni, abantu abanoxinzelelo lwegazi, abanesifo seswekile kunye nesifo sezintso esinganyangekiyo baphakathi kwabantu abanezifo ezinganyangekiyo abangabona bahlaselwa lula yicovid19.

src_text: u ya nga muhasho wa mutakalo wa kapa vhukovhela, vhathu vha re na mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha, vha re na vhulwadze ha swigiri na vhulwadze ha tswio vhu sa fholiho vha vhukati ha vhaṅwe vhalwadze vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho o ḓoweleaho vhukuma vha covid19.
tgt_text: ukususela kumhla wama25 kucanzibe, abantu abanezi zigulo zilandelayo babonisa iimpawu ezinobuzaza: uxinzelelo lwegazi, iipesenti ezingama58 isifo seswekile, iipesenti ezingama56 isifo sezintso esinganyangekiyo, iipesenti ezili17 isandulelangculazi (ihiv), iipesenti ezili16 isifo sombefu okanye isifo esinganyangekiyo sesifuba, iipesenti ezili15 isifo sentliziyo, iipesenti ezili11 ukutyeba kakhulu, iipesenti ezili13 isifo sephepha, iipesenti ezili13 isifo somhlaza, iipesenti ezimbini ezinye izigulo ezinganyangekiyo, iipesenti ezili16.

src_text: u bva nga ḽa 25 shundunthule, vhathu vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho a tevhelaho vho sumbedza tsumbadwadze dzi re khombo: mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha, phesenthe dza 58 vhulwadze ha swigiri, phesenthe dza 56 vhulwadze ha tswio vhu sa fholiho, phesenthe dza 17 hiv , phesenthe dza16 asima kana vhulwadze ha zwa u fema vhu sa fholiho, phesenthe dza 15 vhulwadze vhu elanaho na ha mbilu, phesenthe dza 11 u vha na muvhili wo kalulaho, phesenthe dza 13 lufhia, phesenthe dza 13 khentsa, phesenthe mbili maṅwe malwadze a sa fholiho, phesenthe dza 16. vho mohammed vha ri nyofho dzavho khulwanesa ho vha u tshenzhema u hulela ha u konḓelwa vhukuma u fema ho vhangwaho nga covid19.
tgt_text: umohammed uthi eyona nto yayimoyikisa kakhulu yayiliphika elalibangelwa yicovid19.

src_text: vha ri "ndo tshenzhema maneto, u hoṱola na u valea khanani, he phamphu yanga ya asima ya thusa.
tgt_text: "bendisiva ukudinwa kakhulu, ukukhohlela nokuminxeka kwesifuba, inqawe yam yombefu ibikunceda oku.

src_text: tsumbadwadze dzanga dzo vha dzi sa tou vha khombo nga maanḓa u fana na dza munna wanga, vhe muvhili wavho wa vha u khou rema, vha tshi khou silingwa, khana yo valea, u fhelelwa nga mufemo, sainasi dzo thivha, tshilangwa tshidenya u bva khanani yavho na mufhiso muhulu.
tgt_text: iimpawu zam zazingena buzaza kakhulu njengezomyeni wam, ebenomzimba obuhlungu, enesicafucafu, isifuba esivalekileyo, ukuphelelwa ngumoya, ukuvaleka kwempumlo namarhanana, izikhohlela ezisesifubeni sakhe kunye nomkhuhlane.

src_text: murwa wanga o vha na mufhiso muhulu lwa maḓuvha mararu, fhedzi a fhola nga u ṱavhanya musi tsumbadwadze dzawe dzi tshi fhela.
tgt_text: unyana wam ebenomkhuhlane iintsuku ezintathu, kodwa waphila ngokukhawuleza nje zakuba ziphelile iimpawu," utshilo.

src_text: "muṱa wa vho mohammed wo tevhedza ndaela dzoṱhe dza tsiradwadze mushumoni na hayani, u thivhela u kavhiwa nga tshitzhili.
tgt_text: usapho lwakamohammed beluthobele iinkqubo zococeko emsebenzini nasekhaya, ukuphepha ukosuleleka yintsholongwane.

src_text: "muṱa wanga wo vha u tshi pfesesa, u ṋea ndondolo na thikhedzo, vha tshi ri ḓisela zwiḽiwa zwa tshilalelo madekwana maṅwe na maṅwe, fhedzi tshiṅwe tshifhinga tshitshavha tsha havho tshi nga kha ḓi sa londa, na vhuṱungu vhu vhangwaho nga nyanḓadzamafhungo ya matshilisano vhu a tshuwisa," vho ralo vho mohammed.
tgt_text: "usapho lwam beluqonda, lukhathala kwaye lusixhasa, kwaye belusiphathela isidlo sangokuhlwa rhoqo ebusuku, kodwa ngamanye amaxesha abantu basekuhlaleni basenokungakhathali kwaye ubuhlungu obenziwa kumakhasi onxibelelwano oluntu buyoyikeka," utsho umohammed.

src_text: muhasho wa mutakalo wa kapa vhukovhela uri u dzula u na maḓi muvhilini na u vhea iṱo swigiri malofhani, mutsiko wa malofha na thempharetsha ndi zwa vhuṱhogwa kha u langa covid19, nga maanḓa kha vhalwadze vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho.
tgt_text: isebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni lithi ukuzigcina usela amanzi rhoqo kunye nokujonga iglucose egazini lakho, uxinzelelo lwegazi kunye neqondo lobushushu emzimbeni zizinto eziphambili ekulawuleni icovid19, ingakumbi kubantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo.

src_text: zwiṅwe hafhu, muhasho wo eletshedza vhathu vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho uri: vha nwe mishonga nga nḓila yone, sa zwe vha randelwa nga dokotela wavho.
tgt_text: ukongeza, isebe licebisa abantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo: ukusela amayeza akho ngokuchanekileyo, njengoko kuchaziwe ngugqirha wezempilo.

src_text: vha ṱambe zwanḓa nga tshisibe na maḓi lwa mithethe i swikaho 20, phanḓa ha musi vha tshi fara mishonga miṅwe na miṅwe.
tgt_text: ukuhlamba izandla zakho ngesepha namanzi ubuncinane imizuzwana engama20, ngaphambi kokuphatha naliphi na iyeza.

src_text: vha songo litsha u nwa kana u shumisa mishonga nga nnḓa ha musi dokotela a tshi vha vhudza uri vha litshe nahone vha songo vhuya vha kovhelana mishonga na muṅwe muthu.
tgt_text: ukungayeki ukusela iyeza ngaphandle kokuba uxelelwe ngugqirha wezempilo kwaye ungaze wabelane nomnye umntu ngamayeza.

src_text: vha lingedze u ita nyonyoloso lwa minithe dza 30 nga ḓuvha.
tgt_text: ukuzama ukuzivocavoca imizuzu engama30 ngosuku.

src_text: muhasho uri vhathu vha re na swigiri vha livhana na tshikhala tshihulwane tsha u tzhenzhema tsumbadwadze dzo kalulaho dzi re khombo u bva kha covid19, fhedzi khonadzeo ya khombo ya u lwalesa i vha fhasi arali vhulwadze ha swigiri havho vhu tshi khou langiwa zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: isebe lithi abantu abanesifo seswekile banamathuba amaninzi okufumana iingxaki ezinzima kwicovid19, kodwa umngcipheko wokugula kakhulu uphantsi ukuba isifo seswekile siyalawuleka.

src_text: "nga u angaredza, vhathu vha re na swigiri vha na khonadzeo khulwane ya u tshenzhema tsumbadwadze dzi re khombo na hulela ha vhulwadze musi vho kavhiwa nga tshitzhili.
tgt_text: "ngokubanzi, abantu abanesifo seswekile ngabona banokuba neempawu eziqatha nezinzima xa bosulelwe yintsholongwane.

src_text: sa izwi vhathu vha re na swigiri vha na khonadzeo khulwane ya u vha na tsumbadwadze dzi re khombo dza covid19, u dzulela u vha kule na muṅwe muthu zwo themendelwa hune zwa konadzea.
tgt_text: njengoko abantu abanesifo seswekile besebungozini becovid19 eqatha nje, ukungasondelelani nabantu okanye ukubambana kuyacetyiswa apho kukho imfuneko khona.

src_text: u vha na muvhili muhulu na zwone ndi tshivhangi tsha khonadzeo ya u vha na covid19 i re khombo.
tgt_text: ukutyeba nako kungumngcipheko oqatha wecovid19.

src_text: nga u ralo, u fhungudza muvhili, arali zwi tshi konadzea zwi a themendelwa.
tgt_text: ukuthoba ubunzima bomzimba, ukuba kuyenzeka kuyakhuthazwa.

src_text: "u fhola tshoṱhe nga murahu ha u ḓivalela thungo lwa maḓuvha a 14, vho mohammed vho ḓo humela mushumoni.
tgt_text: ukuba ngumqabaqaba emva kokuzigcina bucala iintsuku ezili14, umohammed wabuyela emsebenzini.

src_text: vha ri u fhola kha tshitzhili tsha corona zwo shandukisa kuhumbulele na kuvhonele kwavho kwa vhutshilo.
tgt_text: uthi ukuphila kwakhe emva kwentsholongwane kuyitshintshile inkqubo yokucinga kunye nemibono yakhe ngobomi.

src_text: vha ri "zwi ita uri u ṱanganedze vha muṱa wau na zwithu zwiṱuku vhutshiloni nga maanḓa.
tgt_text: "ukuqonda kakhulu ukubaluleka koosapho lwakho kunye nezinto ezincinci ebomini.

src_text: ndi ṱoḓa vhathu vha tshi dzhia vhuḓifhinduleli ha mutakalo wavho mishumoni na u funza vha muṱa wavho na vhana, nga maanḓa zwino vhana vha tshi khou vhuyelela zwikoloni.
tgt_text: ndifuna abantu nakweyiphi indawo abasebenza kuyo bathathe uxanduva ngeempilo zabo kwaye bafundise iintsapho zabo nabantwana babo, ingakumbi njengokuba abantwana bebuyele esikolweni.

src_text: kha vha thuse ṅwana wavho nḓila dza vhuṱali dza u sumbedza khonani dzawe lufuno, hu si na u sendela tsini na u farana.
tgt_text: "nceda umntwana wakho afumane iindlela ezinobuchule ngokubonisa uthando kwizihlobo zabo, ngaphandle kokusondelelana kunye nokubambana.

src_text: kha vha ite uri vha muṱa wavho vha shumise zwivhulahatshitzhili phanḓa ha musi vha tshi dzhena nḓuni, u sia zwienda nnḓa garatshini arali vha tshi kona, vha bvule zwiambaro zwoṱhe vha ṱambe phanḓa ha musi vha tshi lumelisa vha muṱa wavho na u ṱhogomela vhukuma kha sia ḽa mutakalo u itela u vha tsireledza.
tgt_text: yenza usapho lwakho luzicoce ngesibulalantsholongwane ngaphambi kokuba lungene endlwini, lushiye izihlangu zalo egaraji ukuba luyakwazi, khulula zonke iimpahla zakho uze uhlambe ngaphambi kokubulisa usapho lwakho futhi qaphela impilo ukuze ubakhusele," utsho.

src_text: "muhasho u eletshedza vhathu vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho u ḽa zwiḽiwa zwa mutakalo, u ita nyonyoloso tshifhinga tshoṱhe, u langa mutsiko wavho, u tevhedza pulane ya mishonga ya dzilafho na u tevhedza maga oṱhe a thivhelo o teaho.
tgt_text: isebe licebisa abantu abanezigulo ezinganyangekiyo ukuba batye ukutya okusempilweni, bazivocavoce rhoqo, bangazifukami izinto ezibakhathaza umphefumlo, basebenzise okanye basele amayeza ngokufanelekileyo baze balandele onke amanyathelo othintelo ayimfuneko.

src_text: vnga mashudu vha sa kavhiwe nga tshitzhili – vha ṱhogomela vhana vhashu vhaṅwe vhavhili," vho mohammed vha ralo.
tgt_text: vnqa zange osuleleke yintsholongwane – yena wayekhathalela abanye babantwana bethu ababini," utsho umohammed.

src_text: u ya nga muhasho wa mutakalo wa kapa vhukovhela, vhathu vha re na mutsiko wa nṱha wa malofha, vha re na vhulwadze ha swigiri na vhulwadze ha tswio vhu sa fholiho vha vhukati ha vhaṅwe vhalwadze vha re na malwadze a sa fholiho o ḓoweleaho vhukuma vha covid19 .
tgt_text: ngokwesebe lezempilo lasentshona koloni, abantu abanoxinzelelo lwegazi, abanesifo seswekile kunye nesifo sezi ukutyeba kakhulu, iipesenti ezili13 kunye nomkhuhlane.

src_text: fholiho, phesenthe dza 16. vho mohammed vha ri nyofho dzavho khulwanesa ho muṱa wa vho mohammed wo tevhedza ndaela dzoṱhe dza tsiradwadze mushumoni na hayani, u thivhela u kavhiwa nga tshitzhili.
tgt_text: unyana wam ebenomkhuhlane iintsuku ezintathu, kodwa waphila ngokukhawuleza nje zakuba ziphelile iimpawu," utshilo.

src_text: "muṱa wanga wo vha u tshi pfesesa, u ṋea ndondolo na thikhedzo, vha tshi ri ḓisela zwiḽiwa zwa tshilalelo madekwana maṅwe na maṅwe, fhedzi tshiṅwe tshifhinga tshitshavha tsha havho tshi nga kha ḓi sa londa, na vhuṱungu vhu vhangwaho nga nyanḓadzamafhungo ya matshilisano vhu a tshuwisa," khonadzeo ya khombo ya u lwalesa i vha fhasi arali vhulwadze ha swigiri havho vhu tshi khou langiwa zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: usapho lwakamohammed beluthobele iinkqubo zococeko emsebenzini nasekhaya, ukuphepha ukosuleleka yintsholongwane.

src_text: "nga u angaredza, vhathu vha re na swigiri vha na khonadzeo khulwane ya u tshenzhema tsumbadwadze dzi re khombo na hulela ha vhulwadze musi vho kavhiwa nga tshitzhili.
tgt_text: "usapho lwam beluqonda, lukhathala kwaye lusixhasa, kwaye belusiphathela isidlo sangokuhlwa rhoqo uinsaaf mohammed onesifo sombefu, ukwazile ukuyoyisa icovid19 .

src_text: sa izwi vhathu vha re na swigiri vha na khonadzeo khulwane ya u vha na tsumbadwadze dzi re khombo dza dzulela u vha kule na muṅwe muthu zwo themendelwa hune zwa konadzea.
tgt_text: umama onesigulo esinganyangekiyo uyoyisile icovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uthi kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba abemi bomzantsi afrika ingakumbi abo banezigulo ezinganyangekiyo ukuba bathathe uxanduva lwempilo yabo.

src_text: ndivhuwo dzo khetheaho kha vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo vhashu vukuzenzele unnamed tshivhalo tsha dzimpfu dza tshitzhili tsha corona zwa zwino tsho paḓa 2000. kha vho lovhaho hu na vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo, vho ramaṱalimakone vhe vha ṱhogomela vha lwalaho, nahone vhe vha vha thikhedzo na mukhuthadzi kha avho vha re sibadela vho khethelwaho thungo kha miṱa yavho.
tgt_text: imbeko ekhethekileyo kubasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed inani lokusweleka okubangelwa yintsho longwane icorona kutsha nje lide ledlula kuphawu lwama2 000. phakathi kwabo bathe baphulukana nobomi babo ngabasebenzi bezempilo, abasebenzi abafezekileyo abebekhathalela abagulayo, kwaye bebeyinkxaso nentuthuzelo kwabo bebesesibhedlele besenziwa amakheswa kwiintsapho zabo.

src_text: zwauri vhanna na vhafumakadzi vho hwalaho mushumo wo khetheaho na u ṱhonifheaho na vhone vha khou kavhiwa nga vhulwadze vha lovha ndi zwithu zwi vhaisaho vhukuma.
tgt_text: le yokuba amadoda naba setyhini benza le misebenzi iphakamileyo nendilisekile kangaka babe bona kuqala begula bade basweleke sisithonga esibuhlungu eso.

src_text: vha tou vha tshivhindini tsha u lwa na dwadze iḽi.
tgt_text: ngabo abangabona baphambili edabini lokulwa nalo bhubhane.

src_text: vha shuma vhe fhasi ha mutsiko muhulu nahone vha tea u hwala mutsiko kha muhumbulo u ḓivha zwauri vha tou vha kha khonadzeo ya khombo ya u nga kavhiwa nga vairasi.
tgt_text: basebenza phantsi koxinizelelo olukhulu kuze kufuneke ukuba bathwale ubunzi ma bengqondo bokwazi ukuba basemngciphekweni wokosulelwa yile ntsholongwane.

src_text: vha tou vha vhahali vhukuma kha nndwa yashu ya u lwisana na tshitzhili tsha corona .
tgt_text: bangamaqhawe namaqhawekazi okwenene wedabi lethu lokulwa intsholongwane icorona .

src_text: ri nea ṱhompho vhahali avha vha afrika tshipembe vhe vha ṱutshela mahaya avho, miṱa na vhafunwa vhavho vha ya mushumoni dzikiḽiniki vha sa fhidzi ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.
tgt_text: siwothulela umnqwazi la makhalipha abemi bomzantsi afrika ashiya amakhaya wabo, iintsapho kunye nabo babathandayo ukuya empangelweni engaphosi nomzuzu yonke imihla kwiikliniki, izibhedlele kunye namanye amaziko ezempilo.

src_text: vha afho vha ṋetshedza ndondolo ya zwa dzilafho, thikhedzo ya zwa ndaulo na dziṅwe tshumelo dzi ngaho u kunakisa na u fha zwiḽiwa.
tgt_text: apho bathi babonelele khona ngenkathalelo yezempilo, inkxaso yobumabhalana nezinye iinkonzo ezifana nokucoca nokulungiselela ukutya.

src_text: musi vha tshi khou ita mushu mo wavho we vha gudela, na riṋevho ri na vhuḓifhinduleli khavho na miṱa yavho.
tgt_text: njengokuba besenza oko kungumsebenzi wobizo lwabo, nathi sinoxanduva kubo neentsapho zabo.

src_text: mutakalo wavho na tsireledzo yavho zwi tea u vha zwone zwa ndeme.
tgt_text: impilo yabo nokhuseleko lwabo kufuneka siyixabise kakhulu.

src_text: ri a vha ṱhonifha na u vha tikedza sa vhanna na vhafumakadzi vhe vha sumbedza uri vho ḓiimisela u vhea vhutshilo havho kha khonadzeo ya khombo vha tshi itela uri ri tshile.
tgt_text: sibanika imbeko siba bekela phezulu njengamadoda nabasetyhini ababonakalise ukuba bazimisele ukubeka ubomi babo emngciphekweni ukuze kuphile thina.

src_text: khavho u ita mushumo wavho u ṱoḓaho vhuḓifhinduleli vhuhulwane vha ṱoḓa thikhedzo yashu khathihi na tsireledzo nga u ṋetshedza zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe).
tgt_text: ukuze bakwazi ukwenza lo msebenzi mkhulu kangaka ufuna amandla badinga inkxaso yethu kwakunye nokhuseleko ngokubonelelwa ngezixhobo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo (iippe).

src_text: nga kha thikhedzo ya tshikwama tsha mulanga na ndambedzo dzi bvaho kha vhunzhi ha vhathu vha afrika tshipembe, mabindu, dzifoundesheni na miṅwe mivhuso, ro kona u wana zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe hu tshi itelwa mihaga iyi ya vhashumi vha re tshivhindini.
tgt_text: ngenkxaso yesolidarity fund nezipho ezivela kubantu ngabantu basemzantsi afrika, kumashishini, kwiingxowamali nakoorhulumente bamanye amazwe, sikwazile ukufumanela aba basebenzi bangabona baphambili edabini bakhaliphileyo izixhobo zokusebenza ezikhuselekileyo.

src_text: he ha vha hu na ṱhahalelo ya zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe) zwibadela zwashu zwi khou sedzana nazwo nga u ṱavhanya u vhona uri zwi vhe hone.
tgt_text: apho bekukho khona ukudingeka kweppe izibhedlele zethu zikulungisa ngokukhawuleza oko ukuqinisekisa ukuba zikhona.

src_text: ri a ḓivha zwauri u swikela zwishumiswa zwa u tsireledza muthu ene muṋe (ppe) a si yone khaedu i yoṱhe ine vhashumi vha ndondolamutakalo vhashu vha ṱangana nayo.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba ukufikelela kwippe asikokuphela komce limngeni abasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo abajongene nawo.

src_text: u mona na shango dzikiḽiniki na zwibadela zwi khou ṱangana na khaedu dza ṱhahalelo ya vhashumi.
tgt_text: kweli lizwe jikelele iikliniki nezibhedlele zijongene nokudingeka kwabasebenzi.

src_text: thaidzo iyi i khou sedziwa.
tgt_text: le ngxaki iyalungiswa.

src_text: u tikedza mushumo une vhashumi vhashu vha re tshivhidzini vha khou ita u mona na shango ri khou rumela dziminisṱa na vhafarisa dziminisṱa kha tshiṱiriki tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe kha shango u ya u wanulusa khaedu nkene kha zwiṱiriki izwi na u shuma na vha maanḓalanga vha zwa mutakalo kha vundu.
tgt_text: ukuxhasa umsebenzi owenzi wa nga basebenzi bethu abanga bona baphambili edabini kweli lizwe jikelele sithumela abaphathiswa noosekela baphathiswa kwisithili ngasinye kweli lizwe ukuze babe nokuzibonela ngokwabo imicelimngeni ngobunjalo bayo kwezi zithili ukuze base benzisane nabasemagunyeni kwezempilo kula maphondo.

src_text: ri tea u shumisana u tsireledza mutakalo hu si wa vhashumi vha re tshivhindini fhedzi, fhedzi na u itela na vhashumi vhoṱhe.
tgt_text: kufanele sisebenze kunye ukukhusela hayi nje kuphela impilo yabasebenzi abangabona baphambili edabini kodwa bonke nje abasebenzi.

src_text: zwa zwino hu na mushumo wavhuḓi uno khou itwa nga madzangano wa u funza miraḓo nga zwa ndango ya phirela, u thivhela na tsiravhulwadze.
tgt_text: imibutho yabasebenzi sele yenze umsebenzi omhle wokufundisa amalungu malunga nokulawula nokuthintela usuleleko nococeko.

src_text: vha khou tikedza mushumo wa muhasho wa zwa mushumo na vhashumi kha u tshimbidza zwa vhuṱoli ha mushumoni u vhona uri matshimbidzele a zwa tsireledzo na mutakalo a kha ngona u itela vhashumi vha no khou humela mushumoni.
tgt_text: ikwaxhasa nomsebenzi wesebe lezengqesho nezemisebenzi ekwenzeni uhlolo lwasemsebenzini ukuqinisekisa ukuba imimiselo yezempilo nokhuseleko iyalandelwa kubasebenzi ababuyela emsebenzini.

src_text: vhunzhi ha madzangano ashu a vhashumi a khou ṋetshedza mafhungo nga ha tshitzhili tsha corona kha miraḓo yao nahone vhatholi vha khou tshimbidza mafulo a u tsivhudza.
tgt_text: uninzi lwemibutho yethu yabasebenzi ikwabonelela ngolwazi lwentsholongwane icorona kumalungu wayo kwaye abaqeshi benza amaphulo okuqondisa.

src_text: iṅwe ya khaedu yo ṱahaho kha shango ḽashu ndi u shata samba vhathu vhe vha itwa ndingo vha wanala uri vha na tshitzhili tsha corona .
tgt_text: omnye wemicelimngeni othe wavela kweli lizwe lethu kukubekwa ibala kwabo bantu bathe bafunyaniswa benayo intsholongwane icorona.

src_text: sa tshitshavha, ri na vhuḓifhinduleli roṱhe ha u fhelisa zwa u shata samba vhathu vho kavhiwaho nga tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: siluluntu, sinoxanduva oludibeneyo lokukuncothula nengcambu ukubeka ibala abantu abosulelwe yintsholongwane icorona .

src_text: ho vha na mivhigo i vhaisaho ya vhathu vhe vha thudzelwa thungo nga tshitshavha tsha havho, ha vha na tshitshavha tshe tsha gwalabela vhalwadze vha re na tshitzhili tsha corona musi vha tshi khou ṱanganedzwa kha zwibadela na kiḽiniki dzapo.
tgt_text: kubekho iingxelo ezihluphayo zabantu abasikiweyo kuluntu abahlala nalo kunye noluntu oluqhankqalazayo kuba izigulana ezinentsholongwane icorona zilaliswa kwizibhedlele zasekuhlaleni nasezikliniki.

src_text: hezwi zwi tea u ima.
tgt_text: lo nto leyo mayiphele.

src_text: sa zwe ra ṱangana roṱhe u ṱuṱuwedza zwa u ṱanganedza vhathu vha tshilaho vhe na hiv ra imedzana ra lwisana na zwa u ponda, ri tea u sumbedza u pfesesa, u konḓelela, vhuhwavho na u pfela vhuṱungu miṱa ya vho kavhiwaho khathihi na avho vho kavhiwaho nga vairasi iyi.
tgt_text: njengoko sasidibene ukukhuthaza ukwamkelwa kwabantu abaphila nentsholongwane kagawulayo (ihiv) saze sema saluqilima ukulwa ukungcungcuthekiswa kwabo, kufuneka sibonakalise ukuqonda, unya mezelwano, inceba, uvelwano nemfesane kwabo bosulelweyo yile ntsholongwane neentsapho zabo.

src_text: zwo ambiwa uri zwa u shata samba zwi itiswa nga nyofho dza u shavha u kavhiwa nga vhulwadze na u sa pfesesa.
tgt_text: kuthiwa oku kubekwa kwebala kuqhutywa luloyiko lokosulelwa sesi sifo nokuswela ukuqonda.

src_text: nḓila ya khwiṋe ya u kunda nyofho dza vhulwadze na dza u kavhiwa ndi u tevhedza maitele a tsiravhulwadze ane a vha hone.
tgt_text: eyona ndlelaingcono yokoyisa uloyiko lokugula olubangelwa lithuku lemvelo nesifo esosulelayo kukuthobela imimiselo yezempilo ekhoyo.

src_text: u ofha u kavhiwa zwi tou dzula zwi kha muthu nahone ndi zwa vhukuma.
tgt_text: uloyiko losuleleko luyavakala kwaye lukhona.

src_text: ri tshi kha zwenezwo, ri a ḓivha zwine ra tea u ita u ḓitsireledza na u tsireledza vhaṅwe.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, siyayazi ukuba yinto emasiyenze ukuzikhusela nokukhusela abanye.

src_text: ri a ḓivha zwine zwa vhanga vairasi na zwine ra nga ita u itela u ḓitsireledza kha u kavhiwa.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba ibangelwa yintoni le ntsholongwane nokuthi yintoni esinokuyenza uku zikhusela ukuba singosuleleki.

src_text: ri a zwi ḓivha uri ri tea u dzula ro sia tshikhala vhukati ha iwe muṋe na muṅwe muthu, u ḓikhethela thungo arali ro ṱangana na avho vho kavhiwaho na u ya sibadela arali ri na tsumbadwadze.
tgt_text: siyayazi ukuba kufanele sigcine umgama wokuqelelana, ukuzigcina singamakheswa ukuba besidibene nabo bosulelekileyo nokuthi sizise esibhedlele ukuba sineempawu.

src_text: ri tea u dzula ri tshi khou langwa nga mafhungo a vhukuma hu si mavharivhari.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke sikhokelwa yinyaniso hayi amarhe.

src_text: tshifhinga tshe muthu a vha a tshi nga ri ha ḓivhi muthu o kavhiwaho kana a kwameaho nga tshitzhili tsha corona tsho fhira kale.
tgt_text: ixesha lokuba umntu athi aka zi mntu owosulelweyo okanye ochatshazelweyo yintsholongwane icorona ledlula kudala.

src_text: zwa zwino, nṱha ha izwo, khonani dzashu, miṱa, vhashumisani na vhahura vha ṱoḓa khuthadzo na thikhedzo yashu.
tgt_text: ngoku, ngaphezulu kunakuqala, abahlobo bethu, iintsapho, oogxa nabamelwane bethu badinga uvelwano nenkxaso.

src_text: kha maḓuvha, dzivhege na miṅwedzi i ḓaho, tshiṅwe tshifhinga ri ḓo ḓiwana ri tshi shaya fhulufhelo na u ḓala nyofho musi ri tshi vhona tshivhalo tsha vhathu vho kavhiwaho na vha lovhaho tshi tshi khou engedzea tshi tshi ya nṱha.
tgt_text: kwiintsuku, iiveki nezi nyanga ziphambi kwethu, ngamanye amaxesha siza kuzifumana siphelelwa lithemba kwaye sibe noloyiko xa sibona inani labantu abosulelekayo nababhubhayo liqhubeka ukonyuka.

src_text: zwi ḓo vha hu uri zwithu zwo vhifha vhukuma, fhedzi ri a fhulufhela uri zwi ḓo vha khwiṋe.
tgt_text: kusenokuba izinto zibe mbi ngakumbi, kodwa siqinisekile ukuba ziza kuba ngcono.

src_text: vhaeletshedzi vha zwa dzilafho na vhorasaintsi vhashu vho ri vhudza uri phimo ya u kavhiwa i ḓo ya nṱha musi ri tshi ya tsini na maṱhakhe azwo.
tgt_text: oosonzululwazi bethu nabacebisi bezonyango basixelele ukuba izinga losule leko liza kunyuka njengoko sifikelela encotsheni yethu.

src_text: fhedzi zwi ḓo tsela fhasi.
tgt_text: kodwa ngokuqinisekileyo liza kuhla.

src_text: ri ṱhonifha na u khoḓa vhashu mi vha ndondolamutakalo vhe vha lovha musi vha tshi khou ṱhogomela vhalwadze.
tgt_text: sinika imbeko abasebenzi benkathalelo yezempilo abathe baphulukana nobomi babo benikezela ngenkathalelo kwabagulayo.

src_text: ri tshi khou vha elelwa, kha ri dzule ri tshi ḓitsireledza na u tsireledza vhadzulapo vhashu nga u ita tshipiḓa tshashu.
tgt_text: ukubakhumbula, masizigcine sikhuselekile kunye nabanye abemi bakuthi ngokudlala eyethu indima.

src_text: ri ḓo kunda vairasi hei ra fhaṱulula tshitshavha tshashu.
tgt_text: siza kuyoyisa le ntsholongwane size silakhe ngokutsha uluntu lwethu.

src_text: ro vhona zwifhinga zwi konḓaho nahone ro kunda.
tgt_text: siwabonile amaxesha awayengawonaanzima kodwa soyisa.

src_text: kha ri shumise maanḓa oṱhe na nungo dzoṱhe musi ri tshi khou shumisana u itela u phulusa matshilo.
tgt_text: imbeko ekhethekileyo kubasebenzi bethu benkathalelo yezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed inani lokusweleka okubangelwa yintsho longwane icorona kutsha nje lide ledlula kuphawu lwama2 000. phakathi kwabo bathe baphulukana nobomi babo ngabasebenzi bezempilo, abasebenzi abafezekileyo abebekhathalela abagulayo, kwaye bebeyinkxaso nentuthuzelo kwabo bebesesibhedlele besenziwa amakheswa kwiintsapho zabo.

src_text: muswa wa rabulasi o ṱanganedza thikhedzo ya covid19 silusapho nyanda rabulasi wa kapa vhukovhela ane a khou bvelela ndi muṅwe wa vhavhuelwa vha tshikwama tsha ndiliso ya tshitzhili tsha corona tsha muvhuso.
tgt_text: umlimi osemtsha ufumana inkxaso yecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osahlumayo wasempuma koloni ngomnye wabantu abaxhamle kwingxowamali karhuluumente yesiqabu kwintsholongwane yecorona .

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka wa miṅwaha ya 27 u khou alusa lupfumo na ifa ḽa muṱa wa hawe nga u bindu dza kha zwa vhulimi.
tgt_text: unomagcinandile suduka (one minyaka enga ma27) ukhulisa igama nobutyebi bosapho lwakhe ngokutyala imali kwezolimo.

src_text: muṋe wa 4 u and 4 me pri mary cooperative ngei kusini kwa mooiplaas o ṱanganedza thikhedzo i bvaho kha tshikwama tsha ndiliso ya tshitzhili tsha corona (covid19) tsha muhasho wa mveledziso ya mahayani, mbuedzedzo ya mavu na zwa vhulimi u itela bulasi yawe ya miroho, zwifuwo na makumba.
tgt_text: umnini we4 u and 4 me primary cooperative elalini yasemooiplaas ufumene inkxaso kwingxowamali yesiqabu yentsholongwane yecorona (icovid19) yesebe lezolimo, iinguqu kwezemihlala nophuhliso lwamaphandle ukwenzela ifama yakhe yamaqanda, imfuyo nemifuno.

src_text: muhasho wo ṋetshedza r1.2 biḽioni ya dzivoutshara kha vhorabulasi vhane vha vha na ṱhoḓea.
tgt_text: isebe linikele ngeevawutsha ezixabisa imali eyibhiliyoni eyi1.2 yeerandi kubalimi abafuna uncedo.

src_text: suduka o amba uri voutshara dzi ḓo mu thusa u alusa sia ḽa vhubveledzi ha makumba ḽa bindu ḽawe.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi iivawutsha zakhe ziza kumnceda ngokwandisa icala leshishini lakhe lemveliso yamaqanda.

src_text: "ndo ṱanganedza voutshara tharu dza ṱhanganyela ya r19 000. voutshara ya r12 000 ya u renga khuhu dza makumba dza 100, voutshara ya r6 500 ya u renga zwiḽiwa na voutshara ya r500 ya u renga mishonga.
tgt_text: "ndifumene iivawutsha ezintathu ezixabisa imali enga ma19 000 eerandi.

src_text: "o thoma bulasi yawe ya u bveledza makumba nga u fusha khuhu dza hayani nga zwiḽiwa zwa u alusa khuhu dzi no khou alamela, zwine zwa konisa u bveledza makumba nga khuhu dzi songo gombiwa.
tgt_text: ivawutsha yemali engama12 000 eerandi yokuthenga iinkukhu zamaqa nda ezili100, ivawutsha yama6 500 eerandi yokuthenga ukutya kweenkukhu kunye nevawutsha yama500 eerandi yokuthenga amayeza.

src_text: khuhu dzawe dza 50 zwa zwino dzi bveledza makumba a 50 nga ḓuvha ane a a rengisa vhege iṅwe na iṅwe.
tgt_text: "uqalise ifama yakhe yemveliso yamaqanda ngokondla iinkukhu zesixhosa zosapho lwakhe ngokutya kokuzenza zibe zinkukhu zamaqanda, nesenza ukuba zikwazi ukuzala amaqanda zingahlangenanga nenkunzi.

src_text: suduka, ane a fuwa mbudzi dza 73, nngu dza 25 na kholomo dza 25, o thoma zwa vhulimivhufuwi nga 2015 nga murahu ha musi o wana ṱhanziela ya n6 ya public management kha gudedzi ḽa vhugudisi ya ikhala na kha gudedzi ḽa vhugudisi na pfunzo ya mushumo wa zwanḓa.
tgt_text: iinkukhu zakhe ezingama50 ngoku zizala amaqanda angama50 ngosuku, aze awathengise qho ngeveki.

src_text: musi o vhona uri shangoni a hu na zwikhala zwinzhi zwa mushumo, o humbula u dzhia vhuḓifhinduleli ha bulasi u unḓa muṱa wa hawe a i shandukisa ya vha bindu ḽi bveledzaho mbuelo.
tgt_text: usuduka, ophinda afuye neebhokhwe ezingama73, iigusha ezingama25 neenko mo ezingama25, waqalisa ukufama ngowama2015 emva kokufumana isatifikethi sepublic management kun6 eikhala training and voca tional education and training college.

src_text: suduka o amba uri: "ro alu wa ri tshi ita zwa vhurabulasi, zwo ralo nga murahu ha musi ndo ṱhaphudza ngudo dzanga ndo humbula u vha rabulasi u fhirisa zwa u ya u ṱoḓa mushumo."
tgt_text: emva kokufumanisa ukuba amathuba emisebenzi anqongophele, wenza isigqibo sokuthathela kuye umsebenzi wefama yosapho eyayilinyelwa ukuziphilisa ngoko ukuze ayiguqule ibe lishishini elifaka inzuzo.

src_text: hezwi zwo sumbedza u vha tsheo yo ṱuṱuwedzwaho, sa i zwi o alusa mbudzi na kholomo dzo vhalaho.
tgt_text: usuduka uthi: "sikhule sifama, ngoko ke emva kokuphumelela kwizifundo zam ndenze isigqibo sokufama endaweni yokufuna umsebenzi."

src_text: bulasi ya miroho ya hekithara dza rathi ya suduka i bveledza mavhele, maḓabula, eregisi na ṋawa.
tgt_text: esi sigqibo sizibonakalise njengesenkuthazo, kuba selekhulise iqela leebhokhwe neenkomo.

src_text: mavhele a ṱavhiwa kha hekithara nṋa, maḓabula kha hekithara nthihi ngeno eregisi na ṋawa zwi tshi ṋekana hekithara yo salaho.
tgt_text: ifama yemifuno kasuduka ezihektare ezintandathu ubukhulu ivelisa umbona, iitapile, iierityisi neembotyi.

src_text: suduka o guda zwinzhi kha covid19 , nga maanḓa zwa uri ndaka dzawe dza nṱhesa ndi zwanḓa zwawe na u shuma nga maanḓa.
tgt_text: umbona ulinywa kwiihektare ezine, iitapile kwihektare enye ukuze iierityisi neembotyi nazo zibe nehektare enye.

src_text: nomagcinandile suduka o shandukisa bulasi ya u unḓa muṱa wa hawe ya vha bindu ḽiṱuku.
tgt_text: umlimi osemtsha ufumana inkxaso yecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osahlumayo wasempuma koloni ngomnye wabantu abaxhamle kwingxowamali karhuluumente yesiqabu kwintsholongwane yecorona .

src_text: afrika tshipembe ḽi khou shuma u tandulula thaidzo ya ṱhahelelo ya venthiḽeitha silusapho nyanda venthiḽeitha dzi bveledzwaho fhano hayani dzi ḓo thusa vhalwadze vha re na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzine dzi sa vhe khombo nga maanḓa uri vha kone u fema zwo leluwa.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uthatha amanyathelo okulungisa ukudingeka kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa silusapho nyanda isixhobo sokuphefumlisa esenziwe apha ekhaya siza kunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula umlo wokulwa nesifo sentsholongwane icorona (covid19) emzantsi afrika womelezwe kukuveliswa kwesixhobo sokuphefumlisa sokuqala apha kweli lizweisixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya oluqhubekayo (icp ap) sinceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula ngokubonelela ngoxinzelelo lomoya onomongomoya okwinqanaba elingephi ukugcina imibhobho yazo yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: nndwa ya u lwa na vhulwadze ha tshitzhili tsha corona (covid19) afrika tshipembe yo khwaṱhiswa nga venthiḽeitha dza u tou thoma u itwa shangoni ḽashu.
tgt_text: esi sixhobo sokuphefumlisa sayilwa libhunga lophandonzulu kwezobunzululwazi nezoshishino (icsir) ngentsebenziswano neqela labehlulelani balapha ekhaya kwaye siza kufezekiswa kweli lizwe jikelele kwizigulane ezibonakalisa iingxaki zokuphefumla kwizigaba zokuqala zosuleleko lwecovid19.

src_text: venthiḽeitha ya continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) i thusa vhalwadze vha re na tsumbadwadze dza covid19 dzine dza sa vhe khombo nga maanḓa u fema zwo leluwa u ṋetshedza ḽevele yo linganelaho ya mutsiko wa muya u re na okisidzheni u itela uri nḓila dza u tshimbidza muya dzi dzule dzo vulea.
tgt_text: "umoya umntu awuphefumlayo ngokwesiqhelo unomongomoya ohlanganisiweyo oziipesenti ezingama23.

src_text: venthiḽeitha yo oliwa nga khoro ya ṱhoḓisiso na zwa nḓowetshumo ya zwa saintsi (csir) nga kha tshumisano na vhashumisani vha tshivhalo vhapo nahone i ḓo ṋetshedzwa u mona na shango kha vhalwadze vhane vha khou sumbedza u vha na vhuleme ha u fema mathomoni a u kavhiwa nga covid19.
tgt_text: umatshini wecp ap ungampompa umthamo ophezulu womongomoya, ukuncedisa umntu ukuba aphefumle.

src_text: "muya une muthu a anzela u u fema u na phesenthe dza 23 dzo ḓalaho nga okisidzheni.
tgt_text: icp ap impompa umongomoya ohlanganisiweyo ngokuqhubekayo.

src_text: venthiḽeitha ya cpap i nga bommba okisidzheni nga vhunzhi, i tshi khou thusa muthu u fema.
tgt_text: ungawandisa okanye uwunciphise umthamo womongomoya umntu awuphefumlela ngaphakathi," utsho umlawuli wesigqeba wecsir future production: manufacturing umartin sanne.

src_text: cpap i bommba okisidzheni yo ḓalaho u ya ngauralo.
tgt_text: izigulane ezisebenzisa isixhobo sokuphefumlisa zinxulumanyiswa ngokuthi zinxityiswe isigqubuthelobuso.

src_text: vha nga gonyisa kana vha fhungudza tshikalo tsha okisidzheni ine muthu a khou i fema, " vha ralo mulanguli muhulwane wa csir future production: manufacturing vho martin sanne .
tgt_text: umongomoya utsalwa kwitanki yegesi yomongomoya uze udityaniswe nomoya wendalo kwisixhobo sokuphefumlisa, ukusuka kulo ndawo ukuya kugqithiselwa kwisigqubuthelobuso uze uphefumlelwe ngaphakathi sisigulane.

src_text: vhalwadze vha shumisaho venthiḽeitha vha ṱumanyiwa nayo nga kha masiki wa khofheni.
tgt_text: usanne uthi ukongeza ekumpontshweni komoya womongomoya, icp ap ikwanceda izigulane ukuba zikwazi ukuphefumlela ngaphandle.

src_text: okisidzheni i kokodzwa u bva kha thannge ḽa gese ya okisidzheni ya ṱanganyiswa na muya mufhe kha venthiḽeitha,une u bva afho ya fhiriselwa kha masiki wa kona u femiwa nga mulwadze.
tgt_text: isixhobo sec pa p singasetyenziswa kwiimeko ezinobuchwepheshe obuxhome kakhulu bezonyango nakwiimeko zethutyana, ezifana nezibhedlele zethutyana nakumaziko okuvalela bucala.

src_text: vho sanne vha ri u ḓadzisa kha u bommba muya u re na okisidzheni, cpap i dovha ya thusa vhalwadze u femela nnḓa.
tgt_text: usanne uthi icsir kufanele ibe ivelise izixhobo zokuphefumlisa ezingama10 000 ekupheleni kweyethupha.

src_text: tshishumiswa tsha cpap tshi nga shumiswa hoṱhe fhethu ha zwa dzilafho ḽa vhalwadze ha thekhinoḽodzhi ya nṱha na kha nzudzanyo dza tshifhinga nyana, u fana na zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana na zwiimiswa zwa u valela vha khou lwalaho.
tgt_text: ngokusebenzisana nabakwasiemens, abakwasimera, abakwaakacia, abakwagabler, umoya kunye neyunivesithi yasekapa (iuct), icsir ivelise icp ap ngokwemigangatho yombutho wezempilo wehlabathi (iwho).

src_text: vho sanne vha ri csir i ḓo vha yo no bveledza dziventhiḽeitha dza 10 000 mafheloni a ṱhangule.
tgt_text: iqela lokuqala lezi zixhobo zokuphefumlisa liza kunikezelwa kwizibhedlele zikarhulumente eziphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yokungabikho kwezixhobo zokuqubisana necovid19.

src_text: i tshi khou shumisana na siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya na yunivesithi ya cape town, csir yo bveledza cpap u ya nga tshilingano tsha zwa dzangano ḽa mutakalo ḽa ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: icsir iqalise ukusebenza ngecp ap emva kokuba ihlabathi liqalise ukufumana ukudingeka okukhulu kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa.

src_text: betshe ya u thoma ya dziventhiḽeitha i ḓo ṋetshedzwa zwibadela zwa muvhuso zwine zwa khou tshenzhema mutsiko nga vhanga ḽa u sa vha hone ha tshomedzo dza u thusa vhalwadze vha covid19.
tgt_text: "malunga nenyanga yokwindla nekatshazimpuzi, kwasuka ngesiquphe kwakho ukungabikho ngokwaneleyo kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa kubaboneleli bethu bezizwengezizwe.

src_text: csir yo thoma u shuma zwa cpap nga murahu ha musi ḽifhasi ḽi tshi khou tshenzhema ṱhahelelo khulwane vhukuma ya dziventhiḽeitha.
tgt_text: apho zazifumaneka khona, zazibiza kakhulu, ngoko ke urhulumente wakhupha isinikimaxabiso sokuveliswa kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa," utsho usanne.

src_text: "henefha nga ṱhafamuhwe na lambamai, ho ḓo thoma u vha na ṱhahelelo ya ṋetshedzo ya dziventhiḽeitha u bva kha vhaṋetshedzi vhashu vha dzitshaka.
tgt_text: isinikimaxabiso ibiyinxalenye yeprojekthi yesizwe karhulumente yezixhobo zokuphefumlisa ngaphakathi kwesebe lezorhwebo, ushishino nokhuphiswano.

src_text: he dza vha dzi tshi khou wanala hone, dzo vha dzi khou ḓura vhukuma, ngauralo, muvhuso wa bvisa thenda ya mveledzo ya dziventhiḽeitha," vha ralo vho sanne.
tgt_text: icsir ikwasebenza nangesixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya omanqanabamabini (ibilevel positive airway pressure) onjongo zawo zikukunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezibukhali kakhulu zecovid19.

src_text: thenda yo vha tshipiḓa tsha thandela ya venthiḽeitha ya lushaka ya muvhuso u bva kha muhasho wa mbambadzo, nḓowetshumo na muṱaṱisano.
tgt_text: umzantsi afrika uthatha amanyathelo okulungisa ukudingeka kwezixhobo zokuphefumlisa silusapho nyanda isixhobo sokuphefumlisa esenziwe apha ekhaya siza kunceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula umlo wokulwa nesifo sentsholongwane icorona (covid19) emzantsi afrika womelezwe kukuveliswa kwesixhobo sokuphefumlisa sokuqala apha kweli lizweisixhobo sokuphefumlisa soxinzelelo oluluncedo kwimibhobho yomoya oluqhubekayo (icp ap) sinceda izigulane ezineempawu ezingephi zecovid19 ukuba ziphefumle lula ngokubonelela ngoxinzelelo lomoya onomongomoya okwinqanaba elingephi ukugcina imibhobho yazo yomoya ivulekile.

src_text: kha vha thuse u fhelisa u phaḓalala ha covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed lushaka lwashu lwo livhana na tshiwo tshihulu vhukuma kha ḓivhazwakale ya dimokirasi yashu.
tgt_text: nceda unqande ukunwenwa kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isizwe sakuthi sijamelene neyona ntlekele inzima kakhulu kwimbali yedemokhrasi yethu.

src_text: kha maḓuvha a fhiraho 120, ro kona u lengisa u phaḓalala ha tshitzhili tshine tsha khou vhanga mutshinyalo u mona na ḽifhasi.
tgt_text: iintsuku ezingaphezulu kwezi120, siphumelele ekulibaziseni ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane izisa intshabalalo kwihlabathi jikelele.

src_text: fhedzi zwazwino, u engedzea nga u ṱavhanya ha tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho he ra eletshedzwa nga vhomakone vhashu vha zwa dzilafho uri hu ḓo itea, ho swika.
tgt_text: kodwa ngoku, ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko esasicetyiswe ngako zingcali zethu zezonyango ukuba kuseza kuza, sekufikile.

src_text: vhathu vha fhiraho kotara ya miḽioni afrika tshipembe vho kavhiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona, nahone ri a zwi ḓivha uri hu na tshivhalo tshinzhi tsha vho kavhiwaho tshi songo vhonalaho.
tgt_text: bangaphezulu kwekota yesigidi abantu basemzantsi afrika abosulelwe yintsholongwane icorona, kwaye siyayazi ukuba luseluninzi olunye usuleleko olungabonwanga.

src_text: zwazwino ri khou rekhoda tshivhalo tshiswa tsha vha kavhiwaho tshi fhiraho 12 000 ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.
tgt_text: ngoku sibhalisa ngaphezulu kwama12, 000 ezehlo zosuleleko ezintsha yonke imihla.

src_text: u bva tshe dwadze ḽa ṱaha nga ṱhafamuhwe, vhathu vha swikaho 4.079 vho lovha nga nṱhani ha covid19.
tgt_text: ukususela ukuqalisa kokuqhambuka kwayo kwinyanga yokwindla, ngabantu abangama4,079 ubuncinane abathe basweleka ngenxa yecovid19.

src_text: u fana na lutsinga luhulu lwa muya u rotholaho vhukuma lu swielaho shangoni ḽashu u bva kha south antlantic nga tshifhinga hetshi tsha ṅwaha, hu na zwipiḓa zwi si gathi zwa shango ḽashu zwine zwa ḓo sala zwi songo kwamiwa nga tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: njengale ngqele iqhaqhazelisa amazinyo indlongozela ukungena kwilizwe lethu ivela kwiatlantic esemazantsi ngeli xesha lonyaka, imbalwa imimandla yeli lizwe eya kusinda kule ntsholongwane icorona.

src_text: ḓumbu ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona ḽo kalula vhukuma na u vha ḽi tshinyadzesaho u fhira zwe ra vhuya ra ṱangana nazwo murahu.
tgt_text: uhlaselo lwentsholongwane icorona lukude le ngobukhali kwaye lutshabalalisa ngaphezulu kwalo naluphi na utshabalalo esakhe salwazi ngaphambili.

src_text: ḽi khou swiela fhu zwiko zwashu na thandululo dzashu u swika magumoni.
tgt_text: lutweza imithombo yethu kunye nokuthatha kwethu izigqibo kude kufikelele ekupheleni.

src_text: u gonya nga u ṱavhanya ha tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho he vhomakone vhashu na vhorasaintsi vha hu bula uri hu ḓo itea miṅwedzi miraru yo fhiraho, ho swika.
tgt_text: ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko ebeluthelekelelwe kwangaphambili zingcali noosonzululwazi bethu kwezi nyanga zi3 zidlulileyo, kude kwafika ke ngoku.

src_text: ho thoma kapa vhukovhela nahone hu khou itea ngei kapa vhubvaḓuvha na gauteng.
tgt_text: kuqale entshona koloni kwaye ngoku kuyaqhubeka empuma koloni nasegauteng.

src_text: naho zwo ralo, musi tshivhalo tsha vha kavhiwaho tshi tshi khou gonya nga luvhilo, ndi zwa vhuṱhogwa u ḓivha uri reithi yashu ya vha lovhaho ya phesenthe ya 1.5 ndi iṅwe ya dza fhasisa ḽifhasini.
tgt_text: kanti, nangona usuleleko lukhula ngokucacileyo, kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuba izinga lethu lokusweleka leepesenti e1.5 liphakathi kwawona mazinga aphantsi ehlabathini.

src_text: hezwi zwi khou vhambedzwa na tshivhalokati tsha reithi ya vha khou lovhaho tsha ḽifhasi tsha phesenthe dza 4.4. ri tea u livhisa ndivhuwo dzashu dza u vha na tshivhalo tsha mpfu tsha fhasi kha shango ḽashu kha tshenzhemo na vhuḓikumedzeli ha vhashumeli vha mutakalo vhashu na maga e ra a dzhia nga u ṱavhanyedza u bveledzisa na u lugisela sisiṱeme ya mutakalo washu.
tgt_text: oku kuthelekiswa nomyinge wezinga lezehlo zokusweleka ehlabathini jikelele elikwiipesenti ezi4.4.

src_text: naho vhunzhi ha vhathu vhashu vho dzhia vhukando ha u thivhela u phaḓalala ha tshitzhili, vha hone vhane vha sa khou ita nga u ralo.
tgt_text: sifanele ukubulela amava nokuzinikela kwamagcisa wethu wezonyango namanyathelo angxamisekileyo esiwathathileyo ukwakha amandla enkqubo yethu yezempilo ngala manani asezantsi okusweleka kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: hu na vhaṅwe vhukati hashu vhane vha khou pfuka milayo ye ya phasiswa ya u lwa na vhulwadze.
tgt_text: nangona uninzi lwabantu bakuthi bewathathile amanyathelo okuthintela ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane, bakhona abanye abangayenzanga loo nto.

src_text: vhukati ha tshiwo tsha dwadze iḽi, u ṋamela thekhisi u songo ambara masiki, u kuvhangana na dzikhonani, u ya mbulungoni kana u dalela vha muṱa, na zwone zwi nga phaḓaladza tshitzhili na u lozwa matshilo.
tgt_text: bakhona abanye apha phakathi kwethu abangayihoyiyo imimiselo ephunyezelwe ukulwa esi sifo.

src_text: hovhu vhu nga kha ḓi vha vhu vhulwadze vhu vhangwaho nga tshitzhili, fhedzi vhu phaḓaladzwa nga vhuḓifari na mikhwa ya vhathu.
tgt_text: ebunzulwini bonje yena ubhubhane, ukukhwela iteksi ungasinxibanga isigqubuthelobuso, iindibano zabahlobo, ukuya kwiziyunguma okanye ukutyelela usapho, nako ngokulula kunokubangela ukusasazeka kwentsholongwane kunye nokuphulukana nobomi.

src_text: nga kha nyito dzashu riṋe vhaṋe – sa vhathu vhone vhaṋe, sa miṱa, sa zwitshavha – ri nga kona nahone ri fanela u shandukisa nḓila ine tshiwo tsha dwadze iḽi ya khou isa shango ḽashu hone.
tgt_text: esi ingasisifo esibangelwe yile ntsholongwane, kodwa sisasazwa yindlela abantu abaziphethe ngayo nendlela yokuziphatha.

src_text: ri tea u ambara masiki wa labi une wa vala mulomo na ningo tshifhinga tshoṱhe musi ri tshi bva hayani.
tgt_text: ngenxa yamanyathelo wethu – njengomntu ngamnye, njengeentsapho, njengoluntu – sinakho kwaye kufuneka simtshintshile lo bhubhane kwilizwe lethu.

src_text: ri fanela u bvela phanḓa na u ṱamba zwanḓa zwashu tshifhinga tshoṱhe nga maḓi na tshisibe kana nga sanithaiza (tshivhulahatshitzhili).
tgt_text: kufanele sinxibe isigqubuthelobuso esenziwe ngelaphu esigquma iimpumlo nomlomo ngalo lonke ixesha siphuma ekhaya.

src_text: ri fanela u bvela phanḓa na u kunakisa na u sanithaiza fhethu hoṱhe ha u shumela hone ha nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke sihlamba izandla zethu rhoqo ngesepha namanzi okanye ngesibulalizintsholongwane.

src_text: tsha vhuṱhogwa vhukuma, ri fanela u vha kule na muṅwe muthu – lwa vhukule ha mithara dzi swikaho mbili – u bva kha vhaṅwe vhathu.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubeke nokucoca size sifake nesibulalizintsholongwane kuyo yonke imiphezulu/imiphandle kuzo zonke iindawo zikawonkewonke.

src_text: zwazwino hu na vhuṱanzi ho bvelelaho ha uri tshitzhili tshi nga hwalwa nga zwipiḓa zwiṱukuṱuku muyani fhethu ho ḓalesaho vhathu, ho valeaho kana hune hu sa tou vha na u mona ha muya zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: okona kubaluleke nangakumbi, kufuneka sigcine umgama wokuqelelana okhuselekileyo – ozimitha ezi2 ubuncinane – ukusuka kwabanye abantu.

src_text: nga nṱhani ha hezwi, ri fanela u khwinisa nga u ṱavhanya vhupo ha nga ngomu ha fhethu ha nnyi na nnyi hune khonadzeo ya khombo ya u kavhiwa ya vha khulwanesa.
tgt_text: ngoku kukho ubungqina obuvelayo bokuba le ntsholongwane isenokuhamba njengamasuntswana amancinci emoyeni kwiindawo ezinabantu abaninzi, ezivaliweyo okanye ezingangeni kakuhle umoya.

src_text: tsheo yashu ya u ḓivhadza nyiledza u bva mahayani ya lushaka nga vhuphara yo thivhela u gonya huhulu ha vhulwadze nga u ṱavhanya musi tshumelo dza mutakalo dzashu dzo vha dzi sa athu lugiselwa zwavhuḓi, zwe zwa vha zwi tshi ḓo vhanga ndozwo khulwanesa ya matshilo a vhathu.
tgt_text: ngenxa yeso sizathu kufuneka ngoko nangoko siphucule imo yangaphakathi kwiindawo zikawonkewonke apho umngcipheko wobungozi bosuleleko umkhulu kakhulu khona.

src_text: kha tshifhinga tshe ra vha ri natsho, ro dzhia maga a vhuṱhogwa u khwaṱhisa phindulo ya mutakalo washu.
tgt_text: isigqibo sethu sokubhengeza ukuvaleleka phantsi kwemiqathango ethile kwizwelonke sathintela ukunyuka ngamandla kosuleleko ngobuninzi ngexesha apho iinkonzo zethu zezempilo zazingekasilungeli esi simo, nento eyayinokukhokelela kweyona lahleko inkulu yokuphulukana nobomi.

src_text: ro ita dzindingo dza tshitzhili tsha corona dzi fhiraho miḽioni mbili nahone vhashumeli vha mutakalo vha tshitshavha vho ṱola vhathu vha fhiraho 20 miḽioni.
tgt_text: kwixesha ebesinalo, sithathe amanyathelo abalulekileyo okomeleza indlela yethu yezempilo yokusabela.

src_text: ro kona u ri hu vhe na mimbete ya sibadela i ṱoḓaho u swika 28,000 ya vhalwadze vha covid19 na u fhaṱa zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana zwi shumaho u mona na shango.
tgt_text: senze uvavanyo lwentsholongwane icorona olungaphezulu kwezigidi ezimbini kanti ke oonompilo benze uhlolo olungaphezulu kwezigidi ezingama20.

src_text: zwazwino ri na mimbete ya khwarathini ya 37,000 kha zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso na zwa phuraivethe u mona na shango, zwo lugela u ṱanganedza avho vha sa koni u ḓikhethela thungo mahayani avho.
tgt_text: sineebhedi ezingama28,000 esibhedlele ezilungele ukusetyenziswa zizigulane zecovid19 saze sakha izibhedlele zethutyana ezisebenzayo kwizwelonke.

src_text: ro renga na u ḓisa tshomedzo dza u ḓitsireledza dza miḽioni zwibadela, dzikiḽiniki na zwikoloni u mona na shango u tsireledza vhashumi vha ṋetshedzaho tshumelo dza vhuṱhogwa.
tgt_text: ngoku sineebhedi zokuvaleleka bucala ezingama37,000 kumaziko abucala namaziko karhulumente kwiizwelonke, ezilungele ukwenza amakheswa abo bangakwaziyo ukwenza njalo emakhayeni wabo.

src_text: ro thola nahone ri khou bvela phanḓa na u thola vhaongi vha u engedzedza, madokotela na vhashumi vha zwa mutakalo kha tshiimo tsha shishi.
tgt_text: sithenge saza sathumela izigidi zezixhobo zokuzikhusela emsebenzini kwizibhedlele, kwiiklinikhi kunye nasezikolweni kwizwelonke ukukhusela abasebenzi bethu abangabona baphambili edabini.

src_text: ri ya phanḓa na u ita mvelaphanḓa kha ndingedzo dzashu dza u lwa na covid 19, fhedzi khaedu yashu khulwanesa i kha ḓi ḓa.
tgt_text: siye saqasha kwaye siyaqhubeka nokufuna abongikazi, oogqirha nabasebenzi bakaxakeka bezempilo abongezelelweyo.

src_text: u mona na mavundu oṱhe, ri khou shuma u engedza tshivhalo tsha mimbete wadini dza vha lwalesaho na kha wadi zwadzo uri i vhe hone u itela vhalwadze vha covid19.
tgt_text: siyaqhubeka nokwenza inkqubela kumalinge wethu okuqubisana necovid19, kodwa owona mcelimngeni mkhulu usengaphambili.

src_text: tshikhala wadini tshi khou vulea kha zwibadela zwo vhalaho nga u lengisa ndondolo ya dzilafho ine a si ya shishi, u shandukiswa ha huṅwe fhethu zwibadela ha itwa wadi dza u engedzedza na u fhaṱwa kana u engedzedzwa ha zwibadela zwa tshifhinga nyana.
tgt_text: kuwo onke amaphondo, sime ngomumo ukwandisa ngakumbi inani leewadi zesiqhelo ezibhedlele kunye neebhedi zabagula kakhulu zezigulane zecovid19.

src_text: ri khou shuma u engedza nḓisedzo ya okisidzheni, dziventhiḽeitha na dziṅwe tshomedzo u itela avho vha ṱoḓaho ndondolo ya vhuṱhogwa, hu tshi katela na u nga pambusa ṋetshedzo ya okisidzheni dze dza vha dzi tshi khou ya u shumiselwa zwiṅwe.
tgt_text: umthamo weewadi zesiqhelo ezibhedlele uphunguliwe kwizibhedlele ezininzi ngokuthi kulityaziswe kwabo badinga inkathalelo engangxamisekanga, ukuguqulwa kweendawo ezithile zesibhedlele ukuba zibe ngamacandelo ongezelelweyo wabagulayo nokwakhiwa okanye ukwandiswa kwezibhedlele zethutyana.

src_text: ri khou shumisa thekhinoḽodzhi dza didzhithaḽa u khwaṱhisa u topola, u sala murahu vho kwamanaho na muthu o kavhiwa na u vha vhea fhethu ha thungo, na u tikedza avho vho wanwaho uri vha na tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: sisebenzela ukwandisa ubonelelo lomongomoya, izixhobo zokuphefumlisa kunye nezinye izixhobo zabo badinga inkathalelo yabagula kakhulu, kuquka nokutshintsha ubonelelo lomongomoya ebelusetyenziselwa ezinye iinjongo.

src_text: sa izwi zwino ri tshi khou sendela tsini na maṱhakheni a vhulwadze, ri tea u khwaṱhisedza uri ri tevhedza tsiradwadze na u khwaṱhisa maga ane a vha hone a u ongolosa reithi ya phiriselo.
tgt_text: sifaka ubuchwepheshe bedijithali ukuqinisa indlela ekubonwa ngayo, ukulanda umkhondo nokwenziwa amakhweswa kwabo bebedibene nomntu osulelekileyo, kunye nokubonelela ngenkxaso kwabo uvavanyo lubafumanise bosulelekile.

src_text: milayo ya u ambarwa ha mimasiki i ḓo khwaṱhiswa.
tgt_text: njengokuba sisondela kwinkcochoyi yosuleleko, sidinga ukulumka ngakumbi size siqinise la manyathelo sele ekho ukuthomalalisa izinga lokusasazeka.

src_text: vhatholi, vhaṋe vha mavhengele na vhalanguli, vhareili vha zwiendedzi zwa nnyi na nnyi, na vhalanguli na vhaṋe vha zwifhaṱo zwiṅwe zwa nnyi na nnyi zwazwino vha kombetshedzwa nga mulayo u khwaṱhisedza uri muthu muṅwe na muṅwe a dzhenaho kha zwifhaṱo zwavho kana moḓoro u fanela u vha vho ambara masiki.
tgt_text: imigaqo engokunxitywa kwezigqubuthelobuso iza kuqiniswa.

src_text: thekhisi dzi tshimbilaho nyendo pfufhi dzapo zwazwino dzi ḓo tendelwa u engedza tshivhalo u ya kha phesenthe ya 100 ya vhanameli, ngeno thekhisi dza nyendo ndapfu dzi sa ḓo tendelwa u ṋamedza tshivhalo tshi fhiraho phesenthe dza 70 dza vhanameli, zwi tshi bva nga uri phurotokhoḽo ntswa dza u fhungudza khonadzeo dza khombo dzi elanaho na u ambarwa ha masiki, u sanithaiza moḓoro na u vula mafasiṱere dzi khou tevhedzwa.
tgt_text: abaqashi, abanini zivenkile kunye nabalawuli, abaqhubi bezithuthi zikawonkewonke, kunye nabalawuli kunye nabanini baso nasiphi na isakhiwo sikawonkewonke bayanyanzelwa ngumthetho ukuba baqinisekise nabani na ongena kwizakhiwo zabo okanye izithuthi kufuneka esinxibile isigqubuthelobuso.

src_text: zwazwino hu na vhuṱanzi vhu re khagala ha uri u vulwa ha thengiso ya mahalwa zwo vhanga mutsiko u vhonalaho kha zwibadela, hu tshi katelwa yunithi dza zwi tatisaho na icu, nga vhanga ḽa khombo dza mimoḓoro , zwi tatisaho zwi elanaho na dzikhakhathi.
tgt_text: iiteksi ezihamba imigama emifutshane ngoku ziza kuvunyelwa ukuba ziwandise umthamo wazo wokukhwelisa i100 leepesenti, ngelixa ezihamba imigama emide zingavumelekanga ukuba ziwandise umthamo wama70 eepesenti, phantsi komqathango wokulandelwa kwemimiselo yokuthomalalisa umngcipheko omalunga nokunxitywa kwezigqubuthelobuso, ukucocwa kwezithuthi ngesibulalizintsholongwane kunye nokuvulwa kweefestile.

src_text: nga u ralo, ro dzhia tsheo ya uri u itela u vhulunga tshivhalo tsha mimbete sibadela, thengiso, u hwala na u iswa ha mahalwa zwi khou imiswa u bva zwino.
tgt_text: ngoku kukho ubungqina obucacileyo bokuba ukuqaliswa kokuthengiswa kotywala kukhokelele ekubekweni kwezibhedlele zethu phantsi koxinzelelo olumandla, kuquka namacandelo abonzakeleyo kunye namacandelo abagula kakhulu (iicu), ngenxa yeengozi zeemoto, ubundlobongela kunye nokwenzakala okunxulumene nabo.

src_text: sa maga a u engedzedza u itela u fhungudza mutsiko zwibadela, hu ḓo vhewa nyiledzo ya tshifhinga tsha u tshimbila vhukati ha awara ya 9 nga madekwana na awara ya 4 nga matsheloni.
tgt_text: ngoko ke sithathe isigqibo sokuba khona ukuze sikwazi ukugcina umthamo wezibhedlele uphantsi, ukuthengiswa, ukusasazwa kunye nokuhanjiswa kotywala kuza kurhoxiswa ngoko nangoko.

src_text: ri khou dzhia maga aya ri tshi tou zwi ḓivha zwavhuḓi uri a kombetshedza nyiledzo dzi sa takalelwi kha matshilo a vhathu.
tgt_text: njengenyathelo elongezelelweyo lokunciphisa uxinzelelo ezibhedlele, kuza kumiselwa ixesha lokuvaleleka ngendlu phakathi kwentsimbi ye9 ngokuhlwa nentsimbi yesi4 ekuseni.

src_text: honeha, o tea u ri thusa uri ri kone u bva maṱhakheni a vhulwadze.
tgt_text: siwathatha la manyathelo sikuqonda kakuhle ukuba abeka ubomi babantu phantsi kwezithintelo ezingamkelekiyo.

src_text: a hu na nḓila ine ri nga tinya ḓumbu ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona.
tgt_text: noxa kunjalo, ayafuneka, ayimfuneko ukusinceda siphumele kweli xesha le nkcochoyi yesi sifo.

src_text: fhedzi ri nga fhungudza tshinyalelo ine tshi nga i bveledza kha matshilo ashu.
tgt_text: ayikho indlela esinokuthi siluphephe olu qhwithelo lwentsholongwane icorona.

src_text: sa lushaka, ro ṱangana u tikedzana, u khuthadza avho vhane vha khou lwala khathihi na u ṱuṱuwedza u ṱanganedzwa ha vhathu vhane vha vha na tshitzhili.
tgt_text: kodwa singawuthothisa umonakalo le ntsholongwane enokuwenza kubomi bethu.

src_text: zwazwino, u fhira na mathomoni, ri na vhuḓifhinduleli ha matshilo a vhathu vha re vhukati hashu.
tgt_text: njengesizwe sihlangene sonke ukuba sixhasane, sinike intuthuzelo kwabo bagulayo kunye nokukhuthaza ukwamkeleka kwabo baphila nale ntsholongwane.

src_text: ri ḓo bva kha ḓumbu iḽi ro tsireledzea.
tgt_text: ngoku, ngaphezulu kunangaphambili, sinoxanduva lobomi babo basingqongileyo.

src_text: ri ḓo vusuludza shango ḽashu ḽa vha na mutakalo na lupfumo.
tgt_text: siza kumelana nolu qhwithela.

src_text: ri ḓo kunda.
tgt_text: nceda unqande ukunwenwa kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed isizwe sakuthi sijamelene neyona ntlekele inzima kakhulu kwimbali yedemokhrasi yethu.

src_text: u pembelela vhafumakadzi nga u vha dzhenisa kha zwa ikonomivha dzhenisa kha zwa ikonomi vukuzenzele unnamed nga ṱhangule afrika tshipembe ḽi pembelela ṅwedzi wa vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ukubhiyozela abantu basetyhini ngokubabandakanya kuqoqoshongokubabandakanya kuqoqosho vukuzenzele unnamed ngenyanga yethupha umzantsi afrika ubhiyozela inyanga yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: mushumo uyu u sumba tshiga tsha anivesari ya ḓuvha ḽe nga 1956 vhafumakadzi vha 20,000 vha gwalaba vha ya union buildings – gogo ḽa vha tshifumakadzini vha ambaho nyambo dzo fhambanaho, vha bvaho fhethu ho fhambanaho na vha mirafho yoṱhe.
tgt_text: eli thuba liphawula isikhumbuzo samhla abasetyhini abangama20 000 ngowe1956 bathi benza umngcelele woqhankqalazo ukuya kwizakhiwo zomdibaniso – inyambalala yamakhosikazi athetha iilwimi ngeelwimi, ephuma kwiinkalo nakwiintlanga zonke.

src_text: vho vhumbana kha migwalabo yavho ya u lwela uri hu fheliswe milayo i thivhelaho mbofholowo ya u tshimbila kha vharema na pfanelo dzavho dza u tshila vho vhofholowa.
tgt_text: emanyene kwisinyanzeliso sawo sokupheliswa kwemithetho emibi yamapasi kunye nelungelo lawo lokuhlala enkululekweni.

src_text: maimo na vhuimo ha vhafuma kadzi afrika tshipembe ṋamusi zwo fhambana vhukuma na zwe zwa ṱangana na vhomme na vhomakhulu washu nga 1956. ri bva kule u swikela afrika tshipembe ḽi si na khethano nga lukanda, mbeu, ḽa dimokirasi, ḽi bvelelaho nahone ḽo vhofholowaho.
tgt_text: isimo nendawo abantu basetyhini ababekwa kuyo emzantsi afrika namhlanje yohluke kakhulu kunaleyo oomama noomakhulu bethu babejongene nayo ngowe1956.

src_text: ho vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi kha u khwinisa matshilo a vhafumakadzi vha afrika tshipembe kha sia ḽa ikonomi, poḽotiki na kha matshilo a vhathu.
tgt_text: sihambe indlela ende ekuphumezeni umzantsi afrika ongenacalucalulo ngokobuhlanga, ngokwesini, olawulwa ngokwentando yesininzi, ohlumayo nokhululekileyo.

src_text: kha tshifhinga tshenetshi tshithihi, ri a zwi ḓivha zwauri hu na zwinzhi hafhu zwine ra khou tea u zwi ita.
tgt_text: kubekho inkqubela yokwenene ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu basetyhini basemzantsi afrika kwezoqoqosho, kwizinga lezepolitiki nakubomi bukawonkewonke.

src_text: vhafumakadzi vha kha ḓi ṱangana na zwa khethululo, u vhaiswa na dzikhakhathi, vha hwala mutsiko muhulu wa vhushai.
tgt_text: kwangaxesha nye, siyaqonda ukuba isende indlela ekusafanele siyihambile.

src_text: arali ri tshi khou ṱoḓa u wedza nga ngoho pfulufhedziso dza ndayotewa yashu ri tea u lingedza nga maanḓa u sedzana na zwa u sa dzheniswa kha zwa masheleni na kha zwa ikonomi zwine zwa ita uri vhafumakadzi vha ḓiwane vha songo tsireledzea kha dzikhakhathi na u tambudzwa.
tgt_text: abantu basetyhini basajongene nokucalulwa, impathombi nobundlobongela, kwaye basajongene nobunzima obukhulu bendlala.

src_text: ro dzhena kha fulo ḽihulwane ḽa vhutumbuli ḽine ḽa ri ṱumanya na ndingedzo dza ḽifhasi dza u swikela ndinganyiso ya mbeu nga 2030. ndinganyiso ya murafho ndi mafhungo a sumbaho tshanduko na ṱhuṱhuwedzo u itela u fhelisa khethululo na dzikhakhathi zwi itelwaho vhafumakadzi na u itela u shela mulenzhe nga nḓila i linganaho kha zwa poḽotiki, matshilisano na zwa ikonomi.
tgt_text: ukuba ngaba sizimisele ekuphumezeni isithembiso somgaqosiseko, kufanele siloyisile uqoqosho nokukhetheka kwezezimali okwenza ukuba abantu basetyhini babe zizisulu zokuphathwa kakubi nobundlo bongela ngakumbi.

src_text: sa tshipiḓa tsha fulo iḽi, ro dzhenela kha ‘ṱhanganelano dza ndivho nthihi’ mbili, iṅwe ndi ya pfanelo na vhulamukanyi ha zwa ikonomi ngeno iṅwe i tshi lwisana na khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu.
tgt_text: sizibandakanye nephulo eliqalayo ukubakho elisiqhagamshelanisa namalinge ehlabathi jikelele okuphumeza umakulingwane ngowesini ngowama2030.

src_text: vhuvhili ha thero idzi ndi dza ndeme kha mafhungo a lushaka lwashu riṋe vhaṋe.
tgt_text: umakulingwane kwisizukuluwana yiajenda yebhongo neyenguqu yokuphelisa ucalucalulo nobundlobongela obugxile kwabasetyhini nokuthatha kwabo inxaxheba ngokulinganayo kubomi bezepolitiki, ezentlalo nobezoqoqosho.

src_text: kha miṅwedzi ya fumithihi u bva tshe pulane ya nyito i sedzaho zwa shishi ya u fhelisa khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu na u vhulawa ha vhathu vha tshifumakadzi ya thoma u shuma ro vha na mvelaphanḓa ya u engedza thikhedzo na ndondolo kha vhaponyi, nahone mvelaphanḓa i khou itwa kha mbuyedzedzo ya zwa mulayo u itela uri vha wane tsireledzo khulwane.
tgt_text: njengenxalenye yeli phulo, sizibandakanye ‘neendibanisela zokusebenza’ ezimbini, enye yeyobulungisa kwezoqoqosho namalungelo kunye nenye yokulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini.

src_text: kha ṅwedzi wa ṱhangule, ri thoma u shumisa pulane ya tshiṱirathedzhi ya lushaka u fhelisa khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu na zwa u vhulawa ha vhathu vha tshifumakadzini.
tgt_text: yomibini le mixholo ibaluleke kakhulu kuqobo lweajenda yethu yesizwe.

src_text: tshipiḓa tshihulwane tsha pulane iyi ndi u vhona uri hu vhe na u dzheniswa nga vhunzhi ha vhafumakadzi kha zwa masheleni.
tgt_text: sele izinyanga ezilishumi elinanye ukususela kwafezekiswa isicwangciso sokusebenza ukusabela kwimeko kaxakeka sokulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini ngamadoda senze inkqubela ekunabiseni inkxaso nenkathalelo kwabasindileyo, kwaye inkqubela iyenzeka kuhlaziyo lwezomthetho ukubanika ukhuseleko olukhulu.

src_text: izwi zwi khou itwa ngauri hu na vhuṱumani ha tshayandinganyiso kha zwa ikonomi na kha zwa matshilisano.
tgt_text: ngenyanga yethupha, siyaqala ukufezekisa isicwangciso sobuchule sesizwe ukulwa ubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini nokubulawa kwabasetyhini ngamadoda.

src_text: tshiimo tsha ikonomi tsha vhafumakadzi afrika tshipembe tshi itisa uri vha vhe vha songo tsireledzea kha u tambudzwa.
tgt_text: umba ongundoqo wesi sicwangciso usekuqinisekiseni ngokubandakanyeka kakhulu kwabantu basetyhini kwezezimali.

src_text: zwo ralo ri tea u khwaṱhisa thikhedzo kha vhafumakadzi u itela uri vha kone u ima nga vhone vhaṋe kha zwa masheleni.
tgt_text: oku kungenxa yokuba ukungalingani kwezoqoqosho nokungalingani kwezentlalo kuyathungelana.

src_text: ro ita tshivhalo tsha vhuḓikumedzeli kha zwa ndinganyiso ya murafho zwine zwa ḓo sedzwa khazwo nga kha pulane ya tshiṱirathedzhi ya lushaka.
tgt_text: isimo sezoqoqosho sabantu basetyhini emzantsi afrika sibenza babe zizisulu zokuphathwa kakubi ngakumbi.

src_text: tsha u thoma, ri khou ya u tshimbidza zwa u dzhenisa vhafumakadzi kha zwa ikonomi nga kha zwirengwa nga muvhuso.
tgt_text: ngoko ke kufuneka siyinyusile inkxaso yabasetyhini ukubenza bakwazi ukuzimela ngokwezezimali.

src_text: ro vhea tshipikwa tsha u vhona uri phesenthe dza henefha kha 40 dza tshumelo na thundu dzi rengwaho nga zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso zwi waniwe kha mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: senze iqela lezibophelelo phantsi kukamakulingwane kwisizukuluwana oko kuza kuqala ukucaca kwisicwangciso sobuchule sesizwe.

src_text: tsha vhuvhili, ri khou ya u engedza thikhedzo ya smme dzi langwaho nga vhafumakadzi na kha vhafumakadzi vhane vha shuma kha sekithara zwadzo kana vha sa shumi.
tgt_text: okokuqala, siza kuqhuba ukubandakanyeka kwabantu basetyhini kuqoqosho ngenkqubo yentengo karhulumente.

src_text: izwi zwi ḓo katela u shumisana na sekithara dza zwa masheleni u itela tswikelo na khonadzeo ya tshumelo dza zwa masheleni kha vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: sesiwumisele umli nganiselo wokuqinisekisa ukuba ama40 eepesenti ubuncinane bempahla neenkonzo ezithengwa ngamaqumrhu karhulumente kufuneka zithengwe kumashishini wabantu basetyhini.

src_text: tsha vhuraru, ri ṱoḓa uri vhafumakadzi vhanzhi vha kone u swikela vhubveledzisi vhu ngaho sa ha mavu.
tgt_text: okwesibini, sizakuyinyusa inkxaso yamashishini amancinci aphakathi naphuhlayo (ismmes) wabantu basetyhini neyabantu basetyhini abasebenza kwicandelo elingekho sesikweni okanye abangaphangeliyo.

src_text: ndi zwa ndeme zwauri vhafumakadzi ndi vhavhuelwa vha mbekanyamushumo dza mbuyedzedzo ya mavu dzi no khou bvelela.
tgt_text: oku kuzakuquka nokudibana necandelo lezezimali ukwenza ukuba iinkonzo zezezimali zifikeleleke kwaye zingababizi kakhulu abantu basetyhini.

src_text: ndi zwa ndeme zwauri kha r75 miḽioni ya ndiliso ya covid19 yo vhetshelwaho zwa vhulimi phesenthe dza 53 dza vhavhuelwa hu ḓo vha vhafumakadzi vha mahayani.
tgt_text: okwesithathu, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basetyhini bayakwazi ukufikelela kwiimpahla ezivelisayo ezifana nomhlaba.

src_text: ri tea u vhona uri zwi tshidzaho vhafumakadzi na vhalimi zwavho zwi ise phanḓa na u wana thikhedzo na musi dwadze ḽo no fhira.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba abantu basetyhini babe ngabaxhamli kwinkqubo yohlengahle ngiso lomhlaba ekhawulezileyo.

src_text: tsha vhuṋa, ri tea u vhona uri vhafumakadzi vho tsireledzea kha khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu mushumoni.
tgt_text: kubalulekile ukuba kwimali ezizigidi ezingamashumi asixhenxe anesihla nu seerandi zoncedo lwecovid19 ebekelwe bucala igalelo lezolimo ngeevawutsha ama53 eepesenti zabo bangabaxhamli iza kuba ngabantu basetyhini basemaphandleni.

src_text: kha hezwi, ri ḓo vha ri tshi khou shuma kha lushaka na kha dzingu u itela khwaṱhisedzo ya buthano ḽa ilo ya khakhathi na u vhaiswa mushumoni.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba abantu basetyhini abangamafama okuzi philisa nawemithamo emincinci bayaqhubeka ukufumana inkxaso nasemva kwalo bhubhane.

src_text: zwo ambiwa uri mbofholowo ai sokou ḓa fhedzi i tou shumelwa.
tgt_text: okwesine, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basetyhini bakhuselekile kubundlobongela obugxile kwezesini kwindawo yempangelo.

src_text: mbofholowo ya vhafumakadzi a i tou vha maipfi o tou ṅwalwaho fhedzi nga nnḓa ha musi i tshi tshimbidzana na vhuḓikumedzeli vhu bvaho kha sekithara dzoṱhe dza lushaka.
tgt_text: kule meko, siza kusebenza kwinqanaba lesizwe nelommandla ekusondeleni ukuqinisekisa ingqungquthela yombutho wezabasebenzi wezi zwengezizwe engobundlobongela nempathombi kwindawo yempangelo.

src_text: musi ri tshi khou lugisela u fhaṱa nga huswa ikonomi yashu nga murahu ha dwadze ḽa tshitzhili tsha corona , ro amba uri a ri sokou hu mela he ra vha ri hone musi ṱhaho ya vairasi i sa athu vha hone.
tgt_text: kuthiwa inkululeko ayinikezelwa, kodwa iyathathwa.

src_text: ri tea u fhaṱa ikonomi yo fhambanaho ya ndeme ine, kha zwoṱhe, ya khwinisa nga maanḓa tshiimo tshi vhonalaho tsha vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: ukukhululeka kwabantu basetyhini kusephepheni nje kuphela ngaphandle kokuba kukhatshwa sisibophelelo esivela kuwo onke amacandelo oluntu.

src_text: izwi zwi amba uri vhubindudzi hashu kha themamveledziso a vhu tei u tikedza fhedzi mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo dzapo, zwi tea u ya na kha mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: njengokuba silungiselela ukwakha uqoqosho lwethu ekuqhambukeni kobhubhane wentsholongwane icorona , sathi asinokwazi ukuvela nje sibuyele apho besikho phambi kokuqhambuka kwale ntsholongwane.

src_text: zwi tea u sikela zwikhala zwa mushu mo vhafumakadzi kha masia oṱhe a vhupulani, ṋetshedzo ya masheleni, vhufhaṱi na u londola themamveledziso.
tgt_text: kufuneka sakhe uqoqosho olohluke ngokubalulekileyo neliza kuthi, phakathi kokunye, liphucule ngokubonakalayo indawo abakuyo abantu basetyhini.

src_text: nga kha maga a fanaho, musi ri tshi engedza mbekanyamushumo dzashu dza mishumo ya tshishavha, ri tea u vhona uri vhafumakadzana nga maanḓa ndi vhone vha topolwaho sa vhashelamulenzhe.
tgt_text: oku kuthetha ukuthi kutyalomali lwethu kwiziseko ezingundoqo kufuneka singaxhasi nje uphuhliso kumashishini asekhaya kuphela, kodwa sixhase namashishini wabantu basetyhini.

src_text: nṱha ha mbuelo, mbekanyamushumo hedzi dzi ḓo vha ṋetshedza zwikha la zwa u swikela vhuṅwe vhukoni na tshenzhemo zwi ṱoḓeaho u itela u dzhena kha ikonomi khulwane.
tgt_text: kufuneka ludalengabomi amathuba emisebenzi yabantu basetyhini kuwo onke amanqanaba okucwangcisa, elezezimali, elokwakha nokulungisa iziseko ezingundoqo.

src_text: sa izwi hu vhuḓifhinduleli ha muvhuso u ṋetshedza zwikhala zwa ikonomi vhafumakadzi na u sika mutheo kwao u itela u tshimbidza zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu, muṅwe na muṅwe kha vhadzulapo u tea u ita mushumo wawe.
tgt_text: ngokomlinganiselo ofanayo, njengokuba sisenyusa iinkqubo zemisebenzi yethu karhulumente, kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba ngokukodwa abantu basetyhini abalulutsha bachongwa njengabathathi nxaxheba.

src_text: mabindu a tea u tikedza vhubindudzi vhu langwaho nga vhafumakadzi musi hu tshi rengwa thundu.
tgt_text: ukongeza kwimivuzo, ezi nkqubo ziza kubabonelela ngethuba lokufumana izakhono ezithile namava adingekayo ukungena kuqoqosho lwesiqhelo.

src_text: vha tea u thola vhafumakadzi vhanzhi na u vhea vhafumakadzi vhanzhi kha maimo a vhulanguli.
tgt_text: nangona iluxanduva lukarhulumente ukubonelela abantu basetyhini ngamathuba ezoqoqosho nokudala inkqubosikhokelo yokuxhasa ukuqhubela phambili ukulingana kwezesini, wonke umntu eluntwini udinga ukudlala indima yakhe.

src_text: hezwi zwoṱhe ndi zwa ndeme ho sedzwa zwauri rekhodo dza sekithara dza phuraivethe kha vhaimeli vha mbeu kha masia a vhulanguli dzi salela murahu kha dza sekithara ya nnyi na nnyi.
tgt_text: abezoshishino kufuneka baxhase amashishini amancinci wabantu basetyhini ekuthengeni iimpahla neenkonzo.

src_text: hezwi ndi mafhungo ane a ambiwa a tshi dovhololwa kha nyambedzano dze nda vha nadzo na tshivhalo tsha madzangano a mabindu a vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: kufuneka baqeshe abantu basetyhini abongezelelweyo baze banyusele abantu basetyhini abongezelelweyo kwizikhundla zezolawulo.

src_text: hu tshi shumiswa maga a eḓanaho, ri tea u fhelisa zwa u sa lingana ha mbeu musi hu tshi holelwa vhanna na vhafumakadzi, hu dzhielwe nṱha maitele a miholo i eḓanaho kha mishumo i eḓanaho zwine zwa vha kha mulayo wa ndinganyiso ya mushumo.
tgt_text: oku kubaluleka ngakumbi xa uqwalasela ukuba imbali yecandelo labucala ekumelweni kwesini kwinqanaba lezikhundla zezolawulo litsala emva kunecandelo likarhu lumente.

src_text: vhafumakadzi vha tea u tsireledzwa kha u vhaiswa na khethululo mishumoni.
tgt_text: lo ngumba ophakanyiswa izihlandlo ngezihlandlo kuthethathethwano endilubamba nemibutho yezoshishino yabantu basetyhini.

src_text: zwi kha vhatshimbidzi vha vhuendedzi, vhalauli vha dziyunivesithi, khoro ndanguli ya zwikolo na madzangano a vhurereli u ita nyimele dza uri vhafumakadzi na vhasidzana vha ende, vha gude na u rerela vho tsireledzea.
tgt_text: ngokufanayo, kufuneka sikuphelisile ukungalingani okugxile kwisini kwimivuzo yamadoda neyabantu basetyhini, size sisebenzise imigomo yokuhlawula umvuzo olinganayo ngomsebenzi ofanayo oqulathwe kumthetho womakulinganwe emsebenzini.

src_text: ri tea u fungelela ra ya phanḓa na ndingedzo dzashu dza u fhelisa vhukunzi vhu itelwaho wa inwe mbeu, khethululo i itelwaho vhafumakadzi ho sedzwa mbeu, na u vhusiwa nga vhanna.
tgt_text: abantu basetyhini kukwafuneka bekhuselwe ekuphathweni kakubi nakucalucalulo emsebenzini.

src_text: ndi maitele haya ane a itisa uri hu vhe na mutsiko u itelwaho vhafumakadzi.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kubanikazi bezothutho, abalawuli beedyunivesithi, iibhodi ezilawulayo ezikolweni kunye nemibutho yezenkolo ukudala iimeko ezilungiselela abantu basetyhini namantombazana ukuba ahambe, afunde aze akhonze ngokukhuselekileyo.

src_text: zwi kha riṋe – roṱhe vhanna na vhafumakadzi – u khwaṱhisedza uri ndeme, vhuimo na mihumbulo zwa vhafumakadzi a zwiho fhasi ha zwa vhanna.
tgt_text: kufuneka siqhubele phambili ngamalinge wethu okukuncothula ukudlisela ngobudoda ngokugqithisileyo, ukuthathela phantsi abantu basetyhini nogonyamelo lwabasetyhini ngamadoda.

src_text: zwi kha riṋe sa vhabebi na vhomakhulu u fara na u alusa vharwa na vhananyana vhashu nga nḓila i fanaho.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi – sisonke amadoda nabasetyhini – ukungqina ukuba ixabiso lomntu wasetyhini, isikhundla akuso neembono zakhe azikho ngaphantsi kwezomntu oyindoda.

src_text: zwi kha riṋe vhanna u hana na u amba zwi khagala ri tshi hanedzana na khakhathi dzo ḓisendekaho nga mbeu hoṱhe hune ra zwi vhona, naho ri tshi nga hanedzana na khonani, vhokhotsi, vharathu kana vhakomana vhashu.
tgt_text: kuxhomekeke kuthi njengabazali noomawokhulu ukubaphatha nokubakhulisa ngendlela efanayo oonyana neentombi zethu.

src_text: kha ri vhe murafho une kha tshifhinga tshashu ra fhelisa zwa u kandeledzwa ha vhafumakadzi kha masia oṱhe.
